node.title: Last time I strayed away from proper monk behaviour, I ...
node.author: puudeli

data.field: did not write tests enjoyed life outside the Monastery Perl golfed with production code started career as a chef and made spaghetti was evil in my wording toward novices posted RTFM anonymously envied for my neighbors Quad core 16GB Linux server home setup stole bandwidth from an open WLAN without permission lied in order to keep my job did some other mischief
